sentence.Network_en: In the days before electronic calculators all children had to learn their tables by hert.
sentence.Network_cn: 在以前没有电子计算器的时代,孩子们都记得住乘法表.

sentence.Network_en: Some unseen fingers, like an idle breeze , are playing upon my hert the music of the ripples.
sentence.Network_cn: 11有些看不见的手, 如懒懒的微(风思)的, 正在我的心上奏着潺潺的乐声.

PerfectNetExp.abs: hersze 赫尔谢, hert 埃尔特, herszman 埃尔斯曼

list.abs: you hert me , and go with a smile ., 你伤害了我 , 还一笑而过.
a chance shadow on the wave of your hert ., 偶尔投影在你的波心.
that found room in my hert ., 占据我的心.
